statement.p: In 24 of the last 50 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{50}}={0.24}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{50}. \displaystyle{P}={0.24}\cdot{50}={12}. We round that as requested to 12 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
